  • Method Details

    • validateInput

      public static boolean validateInput(String s)
      Parameters:
      s - string input representing a position on the chess board (e.g., "e4")
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise Validate the input string to ensure it represents a valid chess board position

    • clean

      public static boolean clean(char[][] board, char[] move, char[] moveTo)
      Parameters:
      move - position of the piece
      moveTo - position to move the piece
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise validate that the path that the piece will travel is empty (there are no pieces blocking the way)

    • isWPiece

      public static boolean isWPiece(char p)
      Parameters:
      p - character representing a chess piece
      Returns:
      true if the piece is a white piece, false otherwise

    • isBPiece

      public static boolean isBPiece(char p)
      Parameters:
      p - character representing a chess piece
      Returns:
      true if the piece is a black piece, false otherwise

    • isPiece

      public static boolean isPiece(char p)
      Parameters:
      p - character representing a chess piece
      Returns:
      true if the piece is a valid chess piece, false otherwise valid based on the methods if it is a white piece/if it is a black piece

    • copyBoard

      public static char[][] copyBoard(char[][] board)
      Parameters:
      board - current state of the chess board
      Returns:
      a copy of the chess board Create a deep copy of the chess board
